tasks.title: Stabilize the multi-runner flight path
tasks.description: Use today's block to harden the modular runner so Python + Node executions feel seamless inside Echo Computer.
steps: Open the runner service file that last emitted flaky output and add a debug log for each queued language.
Write a focused test or script that chains two languages, then capture stdout/stderr ordering.
Document the final command plus a before/after diff in your workspace journal.

tasks.title: Storyboard the signal deck overlay
tasks.description: Sketch how story, palette, and audio cues will float above the terminal without distracting from code.
steps: Add a new `overlays/` mock file describing copy, color, and easing for one card.
Pair visual language with a short line of narrative or sensory detail.
Save a screenshot or ASCII sketch so tomorrow's build can reference the intent.

tasks.title: Publish a pairing field kit
tasks.description: Package a shareable bundle that lets another Echo operator reproduce your latest upgrade.
steps: Record run instructions at the top of the file or README you touched today.
Drop a TODO inviting review plus a question that would spark async discussion.
Send the kit link (path + command) in your preferred channel or the Echo Computer feed.
